Container.Name: PMDA
Container.Overview: PMDA: Plex Music DeDupe Assistant â€“ detect and clean duplicate albums in your Plex music library with optional AI assistance.

Config.Name: Plex Host URL
Config.Description: (Required) Base URL of your Plex server, including port.

Config.Name: Music Section ID
Config.Description: (Required) Numeric ID of your Plex Music library section.

Config.Name: Path Map
Config.Description: (Required) JSON mapping each Plex-library container path to its corresponding PMDA container path.

Config.Name: Plex DB Path
Config.Description: (Required) Container path where Plex's DB folder is mounted.

Config.Name: OpenAI Model
Config.Description: (Optional) LLM model for intelligent duplicate selection.

Config.Name: OpenAI API Key
Config.Description: (Optional) OpenAI API key; leave blank to disable AI assistance.

Config.Name: Log Level
Config.Description: (Optional) Logging level: DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR.

Config.Name: Config Directory
Config.Description: (Required) Host path for config.json, state.db, cache.db.

Config.Name: Plex DB Volume
Config.Description: (Required) Mount point for Plex DB folder.

Config.Name: Music Folder
Config.Description: (Required) Host path for your music; one mapping per Plex library path.

Config.Name: Music Folder 2
Config.Description: (Optional) Host path for a second Plex music library.

Config.Name: Music Folder 3
Config.Description: (Optional) Host path for a third Plex music library.

Config.Name: Dupe Output Volume
Config.Description: (Required) Host path where duplicate albums will be moved.

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: (Required) Host port to map to container port 5005 for the Web UI.
